scripts.copy: cp src/index.html out/index.html && cp -r node_modules/pixi.js out/pixi.js && cp -r node_modules/pixi-filters out/pixi-filters && cp -r node_modules/simplex-noise out/simplex-noise

scripts.dev-win: (if not exist out mkdir out) & npm run copy & npm run version & tsc -w
